name: Signal to the Metaverse - André Elias
description:
Signal to the Metaverse - André Elias

Produced by: André Elias
Song title: "Signal to the Metaverse"

F# Minor 77 Bpm 

Mixed and Master in Ableton by André Elias. 

Cover made on FlipaClip and Glitché for iPad by André Elias


Purchasing a copy of this song gives you the rights to use the song in your personal and/or commercial projects.

YOU MUST copy and paste this in the description and/or credit section of your project:
————————————

Music Produced by André Elias @_andrelias
Song: "Signal to the Metaverse"

————————————
HAVING THIS NFT IN YOUR WALLET WILL ALLOW YOU TO:
- Use the song in your NFTs
- Edit/Make minor adjustments to the song as needed to fit your project
- Use sections of the song in your own projects
- Use the song in your Movies and/or TV Series and/or YouTube videos and/or Promotional Videos and/or Social Media Posts
- Use for remixes.

Please DO NOT resell the song on any other platform aside from hicetnunc.xyz. You can also use objkt.com and/or henext.xyz.

If you resell/burn all copies of the song that you previously owned on secondary, you give up all the rights you previously owned to the song and any project that you used the song on MUST be taken down.

Please DO NOT put your tag on the song and sell it like you made the song.

If you can, show me what you do with the song so I can share.

Please contact me via email or twitter if you have any questions 

Email: andre.elias90@gmail.com
